text: NY-03 gives Republicans lots to worry about  —  Tom Suozzi's victory highlights GOP weakness and D strengths. … Much pre-election hype suggested the NY-03 special to replace lying grifting weirdo George Santos was going to be a nail biter.  In the event, though, it wasn't that close.
